author: Audrey Saunders
description: Champagne replaces cola and maraschino liqueur replaces triple sec in this sophisticated adaptation of a Long Island Iced Tea.
name: Full Monte
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first eight ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with champagne, lightly stir and serve with straws
